title: House of Flying Daggers
creator_credit: Wang Bin, Zhang Yimou Studio, Elite Group Enterprises, Edko Films Ltd. and China Film Co-Production Corporation
brief_description: In 9th century China, a corrupt government wages war against a rebel army called the Flying Daggers. A romantic warrior breaks a beautiful rebel out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

creator_credit_for_label: Wang Bin, Zhang Yimou Studio, Elite Group Enterprises, Edko Films Ltd. and China Film Co-Production Corporation
description: In 9th century China, a corrupt government wages war against a rebel army called the Flying Daggers. A romantic warrior breaks a beautiful rebel out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.
